statements: SELECT * FROM race_registration;
SELECT event_name, registration_date FROM race_registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM race_registration WHERE payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM race_registration WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, registration_date, payment_status FROM race_registration ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, registration_date, payment_status FROM race_registration WHERE payment_status = TRUE ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM race_registration WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) as total_registrations FROM race_registration GROUP BY event_name ORDER BY total_registrations DESC
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM race_registration WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM race_registration WHERE payment_status = FALSE
SELECT * FROM event_details;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM event_details ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT registration_id, participant_name FROM registration_info WHERE payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM event_details WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, registration_date FROM registration_info ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_details WHERE event_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_details WHERE event_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_registrations FROM event_details JOIN registration_info ON event_details.event_id = registration_info.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT * FROM registration_info WHERE payment_status = TRUE ORDER BY registration_date DESC;

SELECT event_details.event_name, registration_info.participant_name FROM event_details INNER JOIN registration_info ON event_details.event_id = registration_info.event_id ORDER BY event_details.event_name, registration_info.registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_details;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM event_details ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_details WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM event_details WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_details WHERE event_name LIKE '%Conference%';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_location, event_date FROM event_details WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_location, event_date FROM event_details WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM registration_dates JOIN event_details ON registration_dates.event_id = event_details.event_id WHERE registration_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT event_details.event_name, payment_status.amount, payment_status.payment_date FROM event_details JOIN registration_dates ON event_details.event_id = registration_dates.event_id JOIN payment_status ON registration_dates.registration_id = payment_status.registration_id WHERE payment_status.status = 'completed';

SELECT event_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM event_details JOIN registration_dates ON event_details.event_id = registration_dates.event_id JOIN payment_status ON registration_dates.registration_id = payment_status.registration_id GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM race_event;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM race_event;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM participant;
SELECT registration_id, registration_date, payment_status FROM registration;
SELECT * FROM payment;
SELECT * FROM race_event;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM race_event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM participant WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT registration_id, event_id, participant_id, payment_status FROM registration WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, registration_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM event_details;
SELECT participant_name, participant_gender, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 25;
SELECT registration_start_date, registration_end_date FROM registration_dates WHERE registration_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, category_distance FROM race_categories;
SELECT * FROM event_details ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name, category_distance FROM race_categories WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM event_details WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 20 ORDER BY participant_age ASC;
SELECT registration_id, registration_start_date, registration_end_date FROM registration_dates WHERE registration_start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_start_date ASC;
